name: WC Active Payment Discount
author: Kairav, Akash Solanki

sections.description:
This plugin is used to get discount on activated payment method. This plugin is depended on woocommerce plugin so Woocommerce plugin should be activated for use this plugin functionality.

Our code platform is flexible and amplified by a global community. The freedom of open-source means you retain full ownership of your store’s content and data forever.

Whether you’re launching a business, taking brick-and-mortar retail online, or developing sites for clients and need to discount on payment methodso use this plugin for a store that powerfully blends content and commerce.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wc-active-payment-discount.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended
sections.faq:
Where can I get help or talk to other users about WC Active Payment Discount?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the [Our Support Forum]
